org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.web.graph
Class AeGraphImageServlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.web.graph.AeGraphImageServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class AeGraphImageServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

Servlet responsible for drawing the BPEL graph on a off screen graphics context and serving the rendered image content.

See Also:
Serialized Form
